description: Use the AWS::IoT::RoleAlias resource to declare an AWS IoT RoleAlias.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 127 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 255 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

RoleAlias.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 128  

Pattern: [\w=,@-]+  

Update requires: No interruption

RoleAliasArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 128  

Pattern: [\w=,@-]+  

Update requires: No interruption

RoleArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 20  

Maximum Length: 2048  

Pattern: arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*)?:iam::\d{12}:role/?[a-zA-Z_0-9+=,.@\-_/]+  

Update requires: No interruption

CredentialDurationSeconds.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: integer     

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption
